health_claims.Vitamin C: Vitamin C supports immune function and is an antioxidant.
health_claims.Omega-3: Omega-3 fatty acids support heart health and brain function.
health_claims.Iron: Iron helps maintain healthy red blood cells and supports energy production.
health_claims.Vitamin B12: Vitamin B12 contributes to normal energy-yielding metabolism and the normal function of the nervous system.
health_claims.Pottasium: Potassium helps maintain healthy blood pressure.
health_claims.Siwgzz:
Siwgzz promotes healthy digestion and supports gut health.*

*This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
health_claims.Sodum: Sodium is an essential mineral that plays a vital role in maintaining fluid balance, nerve and muscle function.  However, excessive sodium intake can contribute to high blood pressure.  Moderation is key for optimal health.
